# Plugin: Simple Link

The Simple link plugin replaces the default TinyMCE dialog by a simple prompt.

This plugin was developed by Choan GÃ¡lvez in April, 2008. Paid by The Cocktail.


## Version History
  0.1 by choan


## Installation

* Copy the `simplelink` directory to the plugins directory of TinyMCE.
* Add plugin to TinyMCE plugin option list.

## Initialization Example
tinyMCE.init({
    theme : "advanced",
    // ...
    plugins : "simplelink,..."
});
